metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28851 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
In x/text in Go 1.15.4, an "index out of range" panic occurs inlanguage.ParseAcceptLanguage while parsing the -u- extension.(x/text/language is supposed to be able to parse an HTTP Accept-Languageheader.)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28851` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-golang-x-text-dev - 0.3.2-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-text package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.2-4ubuntu0.1').
golang-x-text package in esm-apps/focal is affected and needs fixing.
